short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes scores inside Netflix!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View Imdb and Rotten Tomatoes scores of movies and series directly in Netflix! Simple and easy to use.

Please note that this is a fun little project I did on my free time. As this is using only free APIs it cannot support a large amount of requests :)

Version 2.1:
* Add support for Browse By Lanugages.

Version 2.0:
* Can now view Rotten Tomatoes scores!
* Added menu to choose which scores to view.

Version 1.1: 
* Added support for gallery view.
* Added support for search.
